text: 🚨 Energiefragen für den Winter 2024-2025 🌡️Die EU könnte higher energy prices esta winter faced als Russia-Ukraine gas deal ends 💸🔋Russia's contract to supply gas to Europe via Ukraine expires at the end of this year 🗓️Should the winter be particularly cold, the loss of gas imports could create a "worst case" scenario ❄️Europe has sought to abandon Russian gas since the latter invaded Ukraine in 2022 🇷🇺💢EU energy ministers are meeting in Brussels today to discuss energy security issues 📣#EnergySecurity #Russia #Ukraine #GasDeal #WinterIsComing 🔮
